com.blockhaus2000.plugin

Class SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • com.blockhaus2000.plugin.SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IpmPluginClassLoader

    public class SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
implements IpmPluginClassLoader
    This is a ClassLoader that extends the URLClassLoader to provide access to classes from other IpmPlugin's and access to the classses of the jar and the main classes (like CommandRegistrationUtil).
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader

        public SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader(IpmPluginLoader loader,
                          java.io.File file,
                          java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Instances a new SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader with the given arguments. This will call the super construtor with URL of the given File (File.toURI() and URI.toURL()).
        Parameters:
        loader - The IpmPluginLoader where the plugin has been loaded. This is used to provide communication between other IpmPluginClassLoader.
        file - The jar file of the plugin. Is used to bet the URL.
        parent - The parent ClassLoader. Will be used in the super-call.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Will be thrown if URI.toURL() throws it.
        See Also:
        URI.toURL()

      • SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader

        public SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader(IpmPluginLoader loader,
                          java.io.File file)
                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Instances a new SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader with the given arguments. Will call this(IpmPluginLoader, File, ClassLoader) .
        Parameters:
        loader - Will be used in the this-call.
        file - Will be used in the this-call.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Will be thrown if the this-call throws it.

    • Method Detail

      • findClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name,
                           boolean global)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Searchs for the given (full-qualified) class name. If global == true, this will search in all registered plugins.
        Specified by:
        findClass in interface IpmPluginClassLoader
        Parameters:
        name - The full-qualified name of the class to search for.
        global - A bollean that indicates that the IpmPluginLoader has to search for the given class in all registered plugins.
        Returns:
        The class, if found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Will be thrown if the class could not be find.
        See Also:
        IpmPluginClassLoader.findClass(java.lang.String, boolean)

      • findClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Will call IpmPluginClassLoader.findClass(String, boolean) with global = true.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The class, if found
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Will be thrown if the class could not be find.
        See Also:
        URLClassLoader.findClass(java.lang.String), IpmPluginClassLoader.findClass(java.lang.String)
